post.body: <3! I LOVE TINY BONES
<3! I love waking up to this synthy traverse. ♫ http://blip.fm/~18liw
<3! Issuu's new SmartLook turns any document you link from your site into a browser-viewable document. I love this. http://bit. ...
<3! I love the lengths cabbies will go to refuse a credit card and how awesome it can be to play on that
<3! just watched Garden State. I love that movie and its soundtrack
<3! Ahh I love my cats, one minute they are fighting over lap time and the next minute they want nothing to do with me. Sigh...
<3! I'm watching the cricket and surfing the net - gotta love the weekend
<3! Oooooh my god, Frank's (sister's) puppy was so friggin' cute! I thought I was gonna die. I love Julius! X3
<3! ♪「I JUST CALLED TO SAY I LOVE YOU」(STEVIE WONDER) 17:28 (http://tinyurl.com/6y6rkk)
<3! I do think Greg Mankiw love web2.0 tools.
<3! Just installed Twitter Gadget, a twitter add on for gmail. I love it.
<3! If all my luck ran out tomorrow; and all of love was just a memory; you' only miss me like an arrow; cuz I am ashes on ...
<3! I love life!
<3! Everyone is hilarious and I love my life teehee
<3! I made it home! So worth the mission and the cold. USS I LOVE YOUR MUSIC MORE THAN I COULD EVER EXPLAIN!! (L)
<3! btw, the gays told me tonight they love me b/c i'm pretty & i told them i love gays b/c they're gay!
<3! http://twitpic.com/uhyj - Oh Holiday! I love your hair, Holiday!! You slut!
<3! That was an amazing episode of Pushing Daisies. Every show I love gets cancelled prematurely.
<3! The great self-replicating organism bless whoever thought to put peanut butter in brownies. Seriously, I love you.
<3! awwe beth i love you ... sorry
<3! i'm back to work 2mrw and not really looking forward to it. which is sad cuz i love my job. i just wish someone would pul ...
<3! Ive decided to use part of @WaltRibeiro's song, Rush in this weeks Global Geek News podcast. I love his music.
<3! Watchin The Duchess...oh how I love period films.
<3! i love, love, love snow...but really? more? this is so un-vancouver...
<3! Shopping Amazon for the textbooks I need for online courses at Fort Hays. I love virtual college courses!!
<3! I love Whole Foods....
<3! Wondering how I did research before online databases, and yes, I do love the bricks-and-mortar library, but click and d ...
<3! What's your favorite computer error code of all time? I love: PC Load Letter and A Program Quit Unexpectedly. Any other ...
<3! And I almost forgot, I also got the first of the LP's I ordered on Amazon today! It's Os Mutantes; I love it.
<3! Played monkey in the middle with neighbors and kids today. I love 50 degrees in January!
<3! Now, I'm far far far from anti-veggie...I love em, but I give vegetarians credit after two days of this...
<3! Oh I just love the state of Massachusetts. We have no money, but just gave a town $46.6M to build new high school. ht ...
<3! I LOVE this movie. so so so much.
<3! I love my grandma's doorman. He's so cooool
<3! Got my hair done.. I just love being pampered once in a while.. she trimmed it, gave it a 45 minute protein treatment, ...
<3! I really should call her and tell her I love her. Seriously, I should... I want to... I need to... *sigh* Hanging wit ...
<3! I'm at home watching the boys play Pokemon on the Wii. But soon Me and Jack Bauer will become reacquainted. LOL I jus ...
<3! not being so castrating. I love men. You compliment me and complete me. I need you. A universe without men would not exist.
<3! Well, as much as I would love to sit and chat, I have company coming tonight. Not my choice! Must go dust and whatnot.
<3! Man I love Coldplay
